thread.title: U.S., South Korea to Resume Military Exercises Despite Thaw With North

author: Andrew Jeong
title: U.S., South Korea to Resume Military Exercises Despite Thaw With North
text:
SEOULâ€”The U.S. and South Korea said they would resume combined military exercises aimed at deterring North Korea, despite a recent detente with Pyongyang that yielded promises from the regime to suspend weapons tests and commit to denuclearization talks.
The allies opted earlier this year to delay the annual maneuvers, which North Korea routinely denounces, to avoid conflicting with the Winter Olympics and Paralympics in South Korea in February and March.
...
